bibdata.title: American National Standard Calibration of Germanium Detectors for In-Situ Gamma-Ray Measurements
American National Standard Calibration of Germanium Detectors for In-Situ Gamma-Ray Measurements

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The need for accurately measuring radioactivity in-situ for a variety of detector characterization techniques requires that performance criteria for efficiency calibration be developed, and such a calibration technique is described in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
